title: Talking About a Past Holiday (Simple Past)

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn to talk about a past holiday using the German simple past tense, called *Präteritum*.

data.tip: The 'ch' sound in 'ich' is soft and made in the front of your mouth, similar to the 'h' in 'huge'.

content.title: Where You Went
content.setting: Your colleague, Anna, asks about your recent holiday.

conversation_flow.title: State where you were on holiday
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Hallo! Du warst im Urlaub. Wo warst du?

extract_info.holiday_location: Extract the location the user went to

conversation_flow.title: Say who you went with
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, {holiday_location}! Und mit wem warst du dort?

conversation_flow.title: State how long you were there
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Schön. Wie lange warst du dort?

content.text: Great! Now let's learn how to describe your holiday. You can use 'Das ... war ...' (The ... was ...).

data.tip: The German 'W' is pronounced like an English 'V'.

content.text: Here are some verbs in the simple past (*Präteritum*) to describe activities.

content.title: Describing the Holiday
content.setting: Anna asks for more details about your trip.

conversation_flow.title: Describe the weather
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Super. Und wie war das Wetter?

conversation_flow.title: Mention your activities
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfekt! Was habt ihr so gemacht?

conversation_flow.title: Describe the food
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Das ist schön. Und das Essen? War es lecker?

content.text: Let's wrap up the conversation by giving a final opinion and asking about Anna's plans.

data.tip: The stress is on the second syllable: fan-TAS-tisch.

data.meaning: I would like to go there again

content.text: When you use a modal verb like *möchte*, the second verb (like *hinfahren*) goes to the very end of the sentence.

data.meaning: Do you also have holiday plans?

content.title: Giving Your Opinion
content.setting: You wrap up the conversation with your final thoughts.

conversation_flow.title: Give your overall opinion
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Schön! War es ein guter Urlaub?

conversation_flow.title: Say you want to go back again
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Das ist super! Möchtest du wieder hinfahren?

conversation_flow.title: Ask if they have holiday plans
